Dear {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, As a token of our appreciation for your loyalty and valuable feedback, we have decided to grant you a 10% discount for the next year, reducing your premium costs by $880. Please note that this discount is applicable to your account.

4. Add your new credit card details and select "Set as Default" or similar option.

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}} ,  Payee {{ticket.ticket_field_27964921}} (Cc'd here) reached out to us to unlock their account.  Accounts become locked after 5 failed login attempts and remain locked for 10 hours after the most recent failed login attempt. If the account is still locked, you can look up the payee details in your PayPer dashboard, click the Actions button, hover over Payee Status and Unlock payee account. If that option is not there, the account is no longer locked. A good idea would also be to send a password reset email.    I hope this helps.  Kind regards,
[Macro3]:
Dear {{ticket.requester.first_name}} , As a token of our appreciation to your loyalty and valuable feedback we have decided to grant you a 10% discount for the next year, reducing your premium costs by 880$ Best regards, {{current_user.name}} .
Result:
Dear customer,

Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear that your account is frozen and you're unable to create a new account using your Discord or other email. We understand your frustration and we're here to assist you.

Based on your message, it seems like there are two separate issues:
 
1. Account freeze: Accounts can become locked after 5 failed login attempts and remain locked for 10 hours. To unlock your account, please follow these steps:
   1. Log into your PayPer dashboard.
   2. Go to the Payee Status section.
   3. Click on the Actions button.
   4. Hover over Payee Status and select "Unlock payee account" if available.
   5. If the option is not available, your account may no longer be locked.

2. Unable to create a new account: It's possible that there might be an issue with your Discord or other email. We recommend trying the following troubleshooting steps:
   1. Double-check that you're entering the correct email address.
   2. Ensure that you're using a supported email provider.
   3. Clear your browser cache and cookies.
   4. Try using a different browser or device to create your new account.
   5. If the issue persists, please contact our support team for further assistance.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. If you have any additional questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Kind regards,

[Agent Name]
